website_summaries.verdict: Trail lovers in need of something extraordinarily comfortable from New Balance may very well find it in the Appalachian. Indeed, the sandal has comfort in spades, but what further promotes it to must-buy status comes from its accommodating wide fit. There is, unfortunately, just one pebble in this footwear that possibly many people will not at all appreciate—its uninspiring lacing system. All in all, the New Balance Appalachian (despite the challenge it poses during lace-ups) is still leaps and bounds a remarkable hiking sandal, thanks to its compelling combination of outdoor-centric qualities.
pros: A considerable number of consumers got a fantastic fit in the Appalachian, especially in extra wide
Almost everyone who reviewed this New Balance gear reported of its wonderfully comfortable confines
This closed-toe sandal was considered a good form of investment by many
The New Balance Appalachian earned accolades from several owners for being astonishingly light
Several wearers resonated well with the sandal’s eye-catching aesthetics
Its easy-access design, meaning it can be easily put on or removed, impressed about a handful of users
Some of them even likened the sandal to a tennis shoe in terms of on-and-off convenience
cons: Many hikers weren’t thrilled to discover the underwhelming lockdown security of the footwear
They blamed the sandal’s flimsy lacing system for this issue

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe this is from new balance
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a big fan of new balance athletic shoes, especially the trail joggers. So I thought this might be a great choice for some sport sandals. Very surprised to find such a poor knockoff of the Keen sandals. The fit and adjustments or not what you would expect, and the soul and put the materials seem very cheap, like something you would find in the racks Walmart or target. Avoid these and spend a little extra money on the Keens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made for being New Balance brand
customer_reviews.text: These men's sandals fit as expected. However, the toggle that holds and tightens the laces is not effective...possibly a defect. Because of our cold climate the sandals couldn't be worn until recently and the deadline to return them has now passed. I wouldn't recommend buying these..for the New Balance Brand...they are cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: WYOGAL

customer_reviews.title: Large fit, but allows for gel insert
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 14w, but a 14m would have worked. This sandal runs a tad big, especially with no socks, but I’ll keep them as I’d rather have a bit big than a bit small. They’re not nearly as well built as my keens, but at less than half the price, I’ll keep them- don’t think my keens will ever wear out, but do become discolored after five or six years. Enough room to put in a gel insert, which is needed and I will do.Look good, feel ok. A bit big but will be ok with socks and insert. if they were north face or adidas a 15 ew wouldn’t be big enough!!
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Really Like Them
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet. So I ordered the 9 W. They fit really well and are very comfortable. I have only had them for a couple days and have not worn them all day yet but I am expecting good things. I am going on vacation and will be wearing them for long walks. If anything changes I will update this review. Update: I wore them most of last week on long walks I took while on a cruise. They are very comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: W. S.

customer_reviews.title: Do Better!!
customer_reviews.text: The box was in horrible condition. Shoes seemed to be as well! This was for my father, he insist that they should fit although he hasn’t tried them on yet. He thinks they’re nice but I’ll give him a couple days. But the shoes were wrapped in a single sheet of paper (like it was rushed) and like someone dropped them multiple times. I’m surprised this was actually sent out in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: Expected the sandals too run large after reading other reviews. Ordered 12 instead of 13 and fit is great. I have very narrow feet so I have an inordinate amount of bungee lace left over and have to tie in a slip knot to avoid tripping! Additionally, the arch support is fine and walking long distances is no problem. On the downside, the closed toe does not breathe well but my wicking toe socks help. Short enough to keep me from looking too dorky!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Best Summer Shoe
customer_reviews.text: If you walk or hike in hot weather and want a comfortable shoe that protects your feet...you just found it. This is by far the most comfortable shoe we have found to date to wear in the heat of Summer. I am a dog walker that needs a wide width shoe. I often go on trails and wooded areas where the usual flip-flop shoes can cause injury and insecure footings. These New Balance Appalachian Closed Toe sandals offer terrific traction and modest foot protection while keeping the feet cool.
customer_reviews.author: John HuffTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating.
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with the version of these that New Balance previously made. They felt far more minimalist than these. I'd still be wearing them had the bungie laces not exploded on me. The advantages of this pair over previous models is better support over all, and less stress on the bungies. I wear these things daily and am a rather large man {6'6 and over 300 lb} who walks about five miles daily. They aren't showing much in the way of deterioration yet.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and everything they say they are, I love the fit and how you can tighten and loosen at the pull of a string. My feet swell over time so it's nice to be able to loosen them as the day progresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: Deeply concerned about the overall quality after reading the reviews, I have another brand ( teva) that are two years old and hardworn yet in excellent shape except for the footbed is becoming compressed and worn.... initial observations are that the quality and adjustments are only on par with some sandals I've purchased at Walmart 3 to 4 years ago (knock off keens/ teva... only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not up to New Balance standards
customer_reviews.text: The quality is not up to previous New Balance standards. The bungee cord adjustment did not work. I did not read reviews before ordering as New Balance has produced great quality for years. I read some reviews after my disappointment with the product. Other consumers have experienced similar problems. I did a return instead of exchange, based on the similar reviews. I ordered a pair of Keen. More expensive -- yes; however, the quality justified the price difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made, Uncomfortable and No Traction
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are garbage, they offer zero support of any kind, they offer zero traction on wet surfaces, they stretch out and will not under any circumstances conform to your feet, save your money and DO NOT BUY THESE.
customer_reviews.author: GSHOCK75

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a wide sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely wide feet and I didn't realize that most closed toed sandals do not come in wide sizes. I was very surprised to see that New Balance offered these in this particular width. They fit extremely well, and I have worn them all day for several days now with no issues whatsoever. The elastic laces do a decent job of keeping the sandals tight to your feet without cutting off circulation and it's nice to see some bright colors instead of the normal dull Earth Tones that most sandals come in. Overall I am super happy with the sandals and I'm planning on purchasing a second pair just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them anyway... in spite of the size issue. The embossed NB emblem on the insole's heal was uncomfortable to walk on. A shame. NB has always been my favorite shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Clutch

customer_reviews.title: very nice sandal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe, good material, true to fit, comfortable to wear, water does not bother them they get wet but pretty fast to dry. Only thing I noticed was the lace has to tighten each time you put them on not really a big deal but you can't set laces and leave them.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: immediately rushed to purchase backup pair.
customer_reviews.text: "comfort" depends on individual physical condition, life-style, habits, goals. These sandals won't make the individual smarter, leaner, more muscular, healthier, or better looking. As per Shakespere, "Man is the measure of all things": it is all up to each of us, individually. As a super comfortable, supportive, shock-absorbing, protective, and airy footwear this sandal is so good that I immediately rushed to purchase backup pair. My feet have never been happier.
customer_reviews.author: econPROF

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak Fishing shoe
customer_reviews.text: Takes a minute to break in, but once you wear these for a few adventures the shoe really molds to your feet, sole is aggressive and outdoorsy, be careful not to carry mud back in the house. never tighten straps more than once, because the bungee lace system needs to have some spring. this is not a technical climbing shoe. Don't be fooled by the name. Great Kayak Fishing shoe, able to get wet and then dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jcnva

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as Slippers Yet Rugged For the Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Love them right outta' the box! Fit for EEEE width is perfect. Soft, lightweight, but rugged enough for the hiking, fishing, swimming, rock hopping etc. I've already put them through. Bonus: they're not exactly the SF Giants colors, but close enough to wear them to the Park.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Most things I buy are not a good fit these were
customer_reviews.text: Most things I buy are not a good fit these were, but the design on the bottom of the sandal where your feet go dig in, the material on the top of your foot that goes to the bottom of the sandal feels cheap the strings would not stay tight to hold my feet in them, I would not repurchase these sandals they hurt my feet all day and I had to cut the strings and tie a knot for them to stay on my feet, I'm disappointed that it's not better quality material for as much as they charged they should have had good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: mlink

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I have foot problems, bunions and crippled old feet. I needed summer sandals and these were on sale, extra-extra wide and soft as baby's bottom. Perfect for my feet. I wear them all the time where ever they are acceptable. Thank you New Balance!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Palesch

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are a delight. Although I wear a narrow and these are ...
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are a delight. Although I wear a narrow and these are medium-widths, the tie strings pull them together so the width difference is not a problem. They fit length-wise and they are feather-light. My flip flops are heavier.. They are better in appearance than they appear in the ads. Like everything i have ever purchased from New balance they are more than satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: David O. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this sandal. I have difficulty finding sandals with sufficient padding in the sole to keep my feet comfortable. This one works exceptionally well. The closed toe hides the fact that I have had my toes amputated on my right foot. Only sandals I can wear.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Feeling summertime :)
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, i have feet like a hobbit.. what can you do? I usually have such a hard time with summer sandals never being wide enough these are great! 11 extra wide did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: RAJR@74

customer_reviews.title: Good surf fishing sandal
customer_reviews.text: I like the closed toe, I have kicked too much crap in the surf. Don't know how long the elastic laces will last, I will replace them with paracord when they break. I strongly suggest you rinse them off after wading in salt water.
customer_reviews.author: K. Springs

customer_reviews.title: Summer shoe.  Maybe winter show with socks?
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't have to work in a cube farm, these would be on my feet all day long and probably even for bed. I anticipate these holding up very well and am planning on ordering the brown after these start showing signs of wear in a few years. I've been straying from the NB line of footwear recently. These have drawn me back in.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! The traction is amazing, so my husband’s feet definitely won’t slip out from under him while he’s walking/standing (He’s on a walker due to a bad car accident). These gave me peace of mind, and they’re comfortable for him (which most shoes aren’t anymore), and they are VERY well made! 11/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: If you wear inserts in athletic shoes order 1 full size larger. Width single E maybe double EE/
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear when camping, kayaking and making wet landing from zodiacs.They will do the job. I expect to carry boots to wear after landings.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Perrow

customer_reviews.title: Nice style closed toe sandle that comes in wide width
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoe and it has decent arch support. I wear a 10 extra wide, so was pleased to see these described as 10 4E which I assumed to be extra extra wide. Unfortunately what came says 10 Wide on both the box and the shoe.. When I tried them on, they seem to fit well enough. They are not real leather but well made and a value at this price point. So I will keep. The style is great and the rubber toe shield protects the toes.
customer_reviews.author: DDarlene

customer_reviews.title: Great in wide sizes
customer_reviews.text: It can be hard to find wide sizes for my husband and these were a great fit. He has nerve damage in his feet and can't go barefoot. On our trip to Costa Rica these were comfortable for many adventures. Only drawback is that they are very bouyant! My husband said they were like water wings for your feet which made snorkeling with them on a bit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda W.

customer_reviews.title: A little large
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little large and laces loosen throughout the day but over all quality is good and after a summer of ware they are still in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Minshall

customer_reviews.title: Strap Broke First Wear.
customer_reviews.text: My son was excited about these new NB sandals for his upcoming canoe trip. Within an hour of first putting them on the strap broke--the stitching holding the thin strap pulled away. This is poor construction and not reflective of New Balance products as I know them. Fortunately we were in an outdoor equipment store when the sandals broke and were able to purchase some solid, reliable Keen sandals in time for his trip, and I am returning these NB sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenous Random Reader

customer_reviews.title: No thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I’m diabetic with some peripheral neuropathy. On a long flight the edge of the left toebox caught my big toenail and ripped it back and off. I didn’t know until I arrived and found it hanging off with a sock full of blood. I am tossing them.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: RUN TRUE TO SIZE! THEY DID NOT RUN LARGE AS OTHER REVIEWS STATED! HAD TO EXCHANGE FOR NORMAL SIZE!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the sandals for my son, they are nice, however, I wish I wouldn't have followed the advice of the other reviews who said they ran large. I ordered a size smaller for my son and they were too small. I would say they run true to size. Overall nice sandals, a bit on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, check sizing.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable, but it is a little bigger than I expected. I usually wear a size 15EEE but they didn't have this shoe in that size so I took a chance with a 14W and it is plenty big enough. Based on this one transaction you might consider getting a size smaller or do not get it in Wide. The shoe itself is very comfortable though and it is not so big that I cannot wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't wear these yet just checked for fit. Shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't wear these yet just checked for fit. Shoe last runs narrow, ordered 4E width but checking fit and against other 4E shoes these appear to be closer to a 2E, width. Should stretch out somewhat after wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Kachael

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 1/2, ordered size 11 and they fit perfectly. Found these sandels to be comfortable. And nice looking. The foot bed is rubber.
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper 1

customer_reviews.title: comfort for walking
customer_reviews.text: tried on 6 different pair from Amazon. All different manufacturers. Since I live in SW Florida, ventilation is important. These sandals were the best. The leather ones were too hot. They do not come in 9 1/2 so I ordered a 9. Returned the 9's and got 10's They are perfect. They will have to be broken in a bit. I walk for an hour in these and my feet are not fatigued at all. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick F.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe Sizes
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 10.5 size, but this works since they don't make half sizes in this particular sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Kem Cre

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My feet have been stepped on many times by horses, so one foot is much wider than the other. These shoes adjust to my feet and are super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lana J Leicht

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this sandal! It’s my second pair! Very comfortable and fits really well!
customer_reviews.author: James C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have used lots of New Balance cross country style shoes, and love them cause they last forever with no issues. These things I got in June 2017, and already having toe bumber coming apart!? I don't wear sandals often so I would of expected these to last 3-4 years not less then 1. Not quite what I expect from this company. They fit well, and ok price.
customer_reviews.author: Rion Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stand up to rugged wear
customer_reviews.text: My disappointment is keen. These were given as a gift and only six weeks of wear latter, one shoe has come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn and Greg C

customer_reviews.title: Light weight sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight sandals that you don't have to worry about wearing outside or get wet either.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Wow! The NB brand has gone downhill!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but did not last long. No more NB shoes and sandals for me. Not worth the money! They just fell apart!
customer_reviews.author: DWT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I find these to be very comfortable for my feet that are in constant pain. I wear them everywhere, much to the horror of my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: drmutus

customer_reviews.title: Comfy. Can walk all day in them no problem ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy. Can walk all day in them no problem. I don't care for the sole material very much though, it doesn't allow for any sweat wicking or airflow from the bottom of your feet, so your feet will get damp as the day wears on if you have sweaty feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H

customer_reviews.title: My brother loved these. He's physically handicapped and can't wear most ...
customer_reviews.text: My brother loved these. He's physically handicapped and can't wear most sandals. However, he said these are comfortable and seems to love them. Thank you so much for making the wider version available. These sandals are also extremely light.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Sherri Gaither

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have braces on my feet so getting shoes that will fit over them is a challenge. These fit Great and allow me to get air to my feet yet have protection I need and they are really light weight. Love Them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Should come with socks
customer_reviews.text: You really need a pair of white socks to wear these properly.
customer_reviews.author: happy peeps

customer_reviews.title: It’ll work for a camping lake sandal.
customer_reviews.text: Decent. It’ll work for bumming around the lake and camping but not for longer walks or hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these sandals. Very comfortable and reasonably priced. I prefer to wear a thin sock with these. That way my feet don’t get too sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Over all does its job. but has its issues.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is loose due to the lace holding system other wise it fits fine. i have never had them come off my feet but I feel like it could if trail running. they need a better lacing system and this would be a winner
customer_reviews.author: David W. Drake Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fit small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit small. Footbed offered no support and had sharp protrusions in numerous places. Shoes are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly mom

customer_reviews.title: Needs a Velcro strap
customer_reviews.text: Actually returned the shoes. I did not like the fact that the only way to lace the shoe was the bungee cord which doesn’t keep the shoe on tight. Needs a Velcro strap.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Color was too light, Strap in back was none not effective in tightening sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Rotan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable more secure and more foot protection than open toe sandals.
customer_reviews.text: My third pair over the years. I get 2 seasons out of them. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CanineCopper

customer_reviews.title: Light Hard Sandle
customer_reviews.text: the interior of the shoe is hard and uncomfortable to wear for a diabetic foot. While they are light and airy I think they would produce blisters and sores for a sensitive foot.
customer_reviews.author: gdr-alaska

customer_reviews.title: Working well just needs some Break In time
customer_reviews.text: Sandals a quite comfortable for Daily wear but do need some Breaking In to be in the sweet spot so don't get discouraged if they are not quite perfect just give it a week or so and they will be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: Hit across the top of my foot at an odd angle. Almost to tight. If it is a short day I can wear them. I couldn't wear them all the time
customer_reviews.author: CK N

customer_reviews.title: He had ankle replacement and nothing would fit right or be comfortable for him
customer_reviews.text: We have had such a difficult time finding this type of sandal for my husband. He had ankle replacement and nothing would fit right or be comfortable for him. We sent back numerous different brands. This one is perfect. He loves the comfort and also the support it gives.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schrotenboer

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from seller
customer_reviews.text: Product not as described and seller does not support returns
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: I love New Balance and have bought over 15 pairs of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love New Balance and have bought over 15 pairs of tennis shoes and so I was excited to buy these sandals. The sole of the sandals is still pretty good, but the way that the top of the sandal comes together it is like it is made for people with very fat feet. The only thing that holds everything together at the top is a bungee cord and it isn't sewn together like other brands of sandals like this that I have owned. I would not buy a pair of these again.
customer_reviews.author: denabnit

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit apprehensive about the sizing but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive about the sizing but I went with the size of the New Balance shoes that I had before ordering. I have wide feet and the sandals fit perfectly. I have none of the issues other reviewers of this product either regarding size or the overly long fasteners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice, adjustable stretch cord over top for some adjustment. Comfortable to walk in, no rubbing or pinching. Good grip.
customer_reviews.author: M G M Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable sandals, great fit. Only downside is the sliding retainers on the laces. They loosen during active wear and need periodic tightening. Somewhat annoying but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ruth

customer_reviews.title: A+ Sandal, True to Fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very satisfied with these sandals. Ordered the same size as his other new balance shoes and they fit perfectly. Good quality and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kat A

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a longtime New Balance and Dunham customer. Unfortunately, I am not impressed with these New Balance sandals. They seem to run large and they are not nearly as comfortable as most New Balance products I've had in the past. Somewhat disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: He said they felt very comfortable though other than that
customer_reviews.text: The 10 fit my hubby a bit too big. Had to send back. The 9 1/2 was too small. He said they felt very comfortable though other than that. We had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: KarenNga429

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer Hiking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Extremely comfortable. I wear them on 4 mile hikes in the woods almost daily. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Allen E. Shinder

customer_reviews.title: Ok to buy.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Good quality for the price. May last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: eddieo

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my dad and he LOVES them ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad and he LOVES them. He always wears gym shoes for support. We thought we would get these for him to wear for the summer, and now he only wears these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice durability and has maintained color and shape in rough conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Christina young

customer_reviews.title: very uncomfortable for my feet
customer_reviews.text: VERY uncomfortable for my size 15 feet, the arch support is very high and in the wrong place for me
customer_reviews.author: Mindy A

customer_reviews.title: good experience.  good product. would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: delivered on time and as expected. fit well. held up well hiking in Maui. i did get a blister but that is not so unexpected and was easily remedied.
customer_reviews.author: glenn howell

customer_reviews.title: Decent overall.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sandals but a little cheaply made. I would suggest spending a little more and getting Keen's. I normally wear a size 13 and the we in this sandal fit well with size 13.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable size - uncomfortable under the heel/arch.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, comfortable size. Only issue not too happy about is that New Balance places a raised rubber "NB" directly under the heel/arch area -- which for me is uncomfortable! Poor design in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight sandal
customer_reviews.text: New Balance has become trickier to calibrate, with some of the shoes that used to fit me as a 14EE now requiring a 14EEEE,so I shouldn't be surprised that this 14W is a bit narrow, but workable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! They fit and wear great. I can only expect them to last as most NB products seem to hang out with me for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought a pair and liked them so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair and liked them so much, I bought two more. Still wearing first pair and love the comfort!
customer_reviews.author: FL_Plumber

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them and buy a size smaller than I normally wear in New Balance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: dn161

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These fit well. So far no problems. My last pair lasted 4 years and cost 2X this amount. I have used New Balance shoes for many years.
customer_reviews.author: David1301

customer_reviews.title: The sandal is kind of flimsy but it’s OK...
customer_reviews.text: This would seem to be a good shoe however it feels flimsy and it won’t last very long. It’s OK for a temporary purchase. Thank you Amazon.com for trying.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It Does Not Stink
customer_reviews.text: Great product, and very beautiful. My boyfriend loves it. I recommend this product because it's first class.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Ugly, not very wide either. My feet felt very cooped up which I was surprised at being anew Balance. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Oberg

customer_reviews.title: the materials and stitching could have been designed better with superior materials
customer_reviews.text: Overall construction seems minimally stitched. Lacing will not tighten properly, threaded button inadequate. Although this product is made in China, the materials and stitching could have been designed better with superior materials.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Excited to wear them to the river this summer, Great looking sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Fred-Maggie

customer_reviews.title: they fit his foot very well and they are comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these.. they fit his foot very well and they are comfortable to walk in...
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sandal.
customer_reviews.text: First time buying these type of sandals. Very impressed with the comfort and wearability of the shoe. I also like the protection afforded the toes in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4E width
customer_reviews.text: The wide size is listed on Amazon as 4E but it is closer to 2E. I have been buying NB 4E running shoes for years and these were no where near as wide. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Heller

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fits just fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. Very comfortable and fits just fine. He wears a size 13W and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OUT STANDING
customer_reviews.text: I COULD NEVER THOUGHT HOW LIGHT THESE ARE I HAVE BIG 11 4XXXX FEET SO GREAT TO WALK IN
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY TELLS THE WAY IT IS AFTER USEING  GOOD OR BAD

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Bad fit, seemed poorly designed and constructed with cheap appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ole Blue Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Great for bad feet!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is thrilled with these sandals, especially for wearing on the river, boating/fishing/camp. He has wide feet and high arch and these are very comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have always wore NB for running and these are great hiking shoes. When not at work I wear these out constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo Schiffman

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected and arevery comfortable. He chose the New Balance brand as he ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and arevery comfortable. He chose the New Balance brand as he knows how their shoes fit him. Purchased for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Francs D. Irwin, R.N.

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sandals for my boys. Both pairs ,the bungee lace ups broke after the second wearing. I have purchased similiar sandals(different brand),same laces and have gotten two years out of them with no issues. They should certainly last more than one or two wearings.
customer_reviews.author: RAMON C

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great Price and Very Comfortable to wear. Happy Camper !
customer_reviews.author: Freddy M

customer_reviews.title: They are not as comfortable as other new balance shoes I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Not as much arch support as I ecxpected in a new balance shoe. They are not as comfortable as other new balance shoes I have purchased..This one pair of new balance shoes I will not purchase again or recommend..
customer_reviews.author: DW Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit was great! I was concerned as my husband has a very wide foot but it fits great
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Well  made and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Fit well unfortunately they will need some breaking in. Gave me a couple of blisters. Other than that, happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Laszlo Slenkai II

product_meta.title: New Balance Mens Men's Appalachian Sandal-M Men's Appalachian Sandal
product_meta.description: A rugged, closed-toe sandal built to protect your feet while you're on the trail or walking around town.
feature_bullets: Sporty sandal featuring fixed backstrap and stretchy bungee lacing
